topics.body:
So I found a new company who could potentially dub Nichijou: NIS America.

They've licensed and dubbed "Danshi Kōkōsei no Nichijō":http://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Daily_Lives_of_High_School_Boys (from what I understand it's similar to Nichijou except with a largely male cast instead), so I don't see why they couldn't do the same for Nichijou.

Which reminds me, I should probably look into it if what I've heard about it is true.

topics.body:
So I'm finally back home...

Yes, I've just moved out of my dorm and brought all of my stuff back home today. Also went out and had a celebratory lunch with my mom and older cousin.

I feel freaking great right now. Now I've got to go get EHAN and bring him home.

topics.body:
I'm starting to wonder whether I have anger issues regarding games.
If I lose due to my error or lose fairly, then I'm good.
If I lose and it's lag or something outside of my control, then I'm irritated.
If I lose due to cheap or annoying play, _I'm fucking enraged._

I get annoyed as fuck at Smash when I lose and Mortal Kombat X's multiplayer is making me hate the entire game as a whole, which isn't fair.
Oh, and when someone says "git gud", that doesn't make you funny or clever.
*_It makes you a +cunt.+_*
topics.author: 515ddf93a4c72d8a1f000d57
